prompts: Generate a majestic water-type Pokemon with elegant wings and a sleek body design.
Create a mythical creature that embodies the spirit of the ocean with stunning blue feathers.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that has powerful abilities and a calming presence.
Design an ethereal flying Pokemon with a shimmering blue and white color scheme.
Imagine a Pokemon that can control the skies and has a serene, protective personality.
Make a Pokemon with a sleek, streamlined body and large wings suitable for soaring through clouds.
Give me a powerful aquatic legend that thrives in the depths of the ocean and skies.
